alert.note: Alert for Conway; Pope County Higher Elevations; Southeast Van Buren County; Southern Pope County; Van Buren County Higher Elevations (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Van Buren, northeastern Conway and east central Pope Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Jerusalem, or 19 miles northeast of Russellville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hector... Jerusalem... Claude... Cleveland... Broomfield... Catholic Point... Blick... Appleton... Beverage Town... Austin in Conway County... Brock Creek Campground... Scotland... Culpepper... Formosa... Center Ridge... Caglesville... Mountain Man Trailhead... Scottsville... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
